cart.title: Cart
cart.standard_delivery_explanation: Between 7AM and 5PM-Text w/2hr window sent day before
cart.no_date_available: There are no available dates for your choice
cart.delivery_message: Note: Fluctuations in demand (time of year) and weather can play a key role in our ability to meet one of your preferred dates.  After our online sales team processes your order, you will receive a confirmation email with your pickup or delivery date. Our online sales team processes orders Monday through Friday 8AM to 5PM. Orders placed on Saturday and Sunday will be processed the following Monday.
cart.delivery_soil_level_mix: Due to high demand your BigYellowBag of Soil³ Compost and/or Level Mix will be delivered on or before May 8th.  Please be on the lookout for a text message from us the day before your delivery with your delivery time window.
cart.notes_placeholder: example: product placement if delivered, narrow roads, dead ends, gate code, etc.
cart.cannot_mix_methods: Pickups and Deliveries cannot be combined in the same order.
cart.no_checkout_available: An error ocurred while processing your request
cart.select_option_in_step_one: To select your dates, please choose an option in Step 1

financing.banner_title: Enjoy now and pay later financing options available for our clients
financing.banner_text_html: Bread allows you an easy and honest way to pay monthly for your big purchases. Checking your rate takes only seconds. Transparent pricing, easy online payments, and no prepayment penalties make your purchase worry-free.
financing.advantages_text: Here are some advantages to use 'Bread' as a finance method
financing.advantage3_text: Check your rates and get approved in minutes.
financing.advantage4_text: Your money is protected 100% end to end.
financing.financing_available_text: We think in our customers, for that reason we want to give you the most comfortable way to pay. What are you waiting for? get a wonderful sod with a wonderful payment method. Click below to get the best rate!

product.pallet_text_html:
Currently there is a maximum order of 6 pallets (3,000 sq ft) when ordering online.

If you wish to purchase more than 6 pallets, then please visit our sod quote page.
product.pallet_unavailable_html: This product is currently unavailable in your area. Please call us at 888-360-1125 to discuss options, or click here for a sod quote. Thanks!
product.pickup_unavailable_html: This product is currently not available for pickup. Please call us at 888-360-1125, or email us at onlinesales@supersod.com with any questions.
product.sod_picker_text_html:
10 sq. ft. = 1 Roll (2 ft. x 5 ft.)
500 sq. ft. = 50 Rolls = 1 Pallet (~2,500 lbs.)

You don't know how much to order?
Use our Yard Area Calculator
product.soil_calculator_text_html:
You don't know how much to order?
Use our Soil Calculator
